summary:
Starting my career in a multinational tech company in HR and having done business for many Fortune 500 tech companies for more than 15 years,  I’ve got the know-how to manage complex recruitment-based projects as well as the skills to be able to work in diversified organizations. Traveling through different countries for years has allowed me to be able to connect with and talk to almost anyone, anywhere, anytime.

Founding HR Venue, is a milestone in my career and a revolutionary product in the HR technologies market in Turkey. Being the 1st Video Interview company in Turkey, we transformed the hiring practices of many local and international companies, with my visionary team. 

I proud my myself being an analytical problem solver in the work environment with my 15+ years of experience without losing my people focus.

          Umit puts the 'coach' in career coaching. She is accessible, approachable, gives just the right combination of tough love and motivation with empathetic support, and kept me focused and motivated during a very discouraging time. Her workshops were refreshingly honest and direct and showed someone who is not only fully committed to her clients' success, but someone who is informed, passionate, and immediately relatable with her signature great sense of humor. 

Unlike other coaches who might foster dependency, Umit gave me the tools to self-actualize and have the confidence to reach my potential. Our meetings were not only a cathartic discussion of things on my mind, but I always left feeling more focused, truly 'heard', and with renewed energy and determination to tackle the next stage of the job search.

Job searching is a stressful, discouraging, emotionally intense time - but it is gifted coaches like Umit who makes that journey just a little bit easier. Thank you!

Andrea Warnick
